# List of chairmen of the People's Khural of the Republic of Buryatia

'''List of chairmen of the People's Khural of Buryatia'''.
This is a list of chairmen (speakers) of the Supreme Council 1990–1994:
{|class="wikitable"
!Name
!Term
|-
|Sergey Buldayev
|April 19, 1990–October 21, 1991
|-
|Leonid Potapov
|October 21, 1991–July 1, 1994
|}
This is a list of chairmen (speakers) of the People's Khural of Buryatia
{|class="wikitable"
!Name
!Term
|-
|Mikhail Semyonov
|July 21, 1994–July 5, 1998July 20, 1998–June 23, 2002
|-
|Alexander Lubsanov
|July 22, 2002–December 2, 2007
|-
|Matvey Gershevich
|December 11, 2007–September 8, 2013September 17, 2013–April 23, 2015
|-
|Tsyrenov-Dashi Dorzhiev
|August 28, 2015–September 19, 2018
|-
|Vladimir Pavlov
|September 19, 2018–Incumbent
|}
Sources
